§GThis reform can be advanced via decision!§!\nThe bureaucracy works in bad faith for their own personal gain. This may be paired with systematic incompetence, but it certaintly hampers our state's ability to govern effectively regardless.

§GThis reform can be advanced via decision!§!\nThe bureaucracy genuinely works as well as it can for the good of the state and the nation as a whole, however due to either a lack of funding, bad systemic policies, or simply an incompetent bureaucratic base, it simply is not able to perform the tasks required of it professionally, promptly, and properly.

§GThis reform can be advanced via decision!§!\nThe bureaucracy quickly, professionally, and efficiently executes what is demanded of it by our government. This will certaintly save a lot of headaches, both of our average people, capitalists, government workers and leadership!
We are still recovering from the deep divisions caused by the slavery debate and subsequent civil war.

Due to our expansion of civil rights to southern negroes, the south is engulfed in white riots and negro counter-riots. The southern whites say we have overstepped the bounds of states' rights, while the southern negroes claim we have not gone far enough, and have not done enough to put down white riots. We must simply pray that the anger burns itself out, and that peace soon returns to the southern states.
The Corn Laws were a set of laws blocking import of cheap corn.

Tiny State Flag

§WThis tag exists to tell you which cb to use for this state. The sizes are as follows:

early (pre 1866):
tiny - <125k
small - >125k <250k
medium - >250k <350k
large - >350k <550k
huge - >550k

middle (pre 1896 post 1866):
tiny - <200k
small - >200k <375k
medium - >375k <600k
large - >600k <800k
huge - >800k

late (post 1896):
tiny - <300k
small - >300k <550k
medium - >550k <800k
large - >800k <1250k
huge - >1250k
